rabbit.name: Robert Rabbit
rabbit.description: A fluffy rabbit on a quest to find the keys to valley of carrots.

dog.name: Diesel Dog
dog.description: An alert dog watching out for lurking intruders.
speech: Have you been trying to take my bones?

cat.name: Cassie Cat
cat.description: A curious and sneaky cat looking for the next toy to play and scratch with
speech: My, you have a very fluffy tail!
You seem like a very fluffy toy to play with my claws!
